section.section:
To maintain a sustainable community designation:
every 5 years a sponsor shall file an updated plan and application with the Department; and
the Secretary shall make designation recommendations for approval by the Smart Growth Subcabinet under § 6-204 of this subtitle.

The Department shall convene an interagency review team from the agencies of the Smart Growth Subcabinet to:
review applications and plans;
provide assistance and guidance to applicants; and
make recommendations to the Secretary.
The Smart Growth Subcabinet may redesignate an area as a sustainable community taking into consideration the factors in subsection (a) of this section.
